name: Order of the Void
description:
A single player RPG game made by a single game designer. You play as Dorian, a student of an order of mages who practices dark magic for the right reasons. This order has dedicated their cause to prevent the worlds from falling into chaos. The temple recently found the location of an ancient artifact being the void orb, which is the creation of their magic. The price for using the dark void magic is that it can corrupt you. Dorian wanted to prove himself with the challenging task requested to set out and seek the void orb.

Game Designer: Rayane Nasser

If you'd like the chance to connect with a potential intern or hire, please complete the industry connect form and our Centre of Industry Engagement will be in touch with you: https://forms.gle/ADJPu2jz8HFzvDh78

If you would like to talk to the team to understand the project better or for any questions or feedback that you may have, please join the video meeting link from any time between 5PM to 6PM on 10th January:  https://meet.google.com/pgy-cksh-tim
